mapper.sql: eid, name, account, password, sex, tel, idCard, email, birthday, address, sal, tid, createTime, founderId, enable
mapper.insert: insert into employee (eid, name, account, password, sex, tel, idCard, email, birthday, address, sal, tid, createTime, founderId, enable) values (#{eid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{tel,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{idcard,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sal,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{tid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{founderid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{enable,jdbcType=CHAR})

mapper.update:
update employee
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR},
tel = #{tel,jdbcType=CHAR},
idCard = #{idcard,jdbcType=CHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sal = #{sal,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
tid = #{tid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
founderId = #{founderid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
enable = #{enable,jdbcType=CHAR},
where eid = #{eid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update employee set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=CHAR}, idCard = #{idcard,jdbcType=CHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sal = #{sal,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, tid = #{tid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, founderId = #{founderid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, enable = #{enable,jdbcType=CHAR} where eid = #{eid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT e.*,t.*,(SELECT `name` FROM employee em WHERE em.eid = e.founderId) name2 FROM employee e INNER JOIN transfer t ON e.tid = t.transfer_id WHERE e.account = #{account}

mapper.update: UPDATE expressage.employee SET ENABLE = 0 WHERE eid = #{eid}
